intro:
The ultimate railway driving game has arrived!
Experience mind-blowing speeds over 1000km/h or enjoy complete freedom in Free Drive!
description:
The fictional railway “Kowa Railway,” boasting over 500,000 views on YouTube, now comes to life as a game!
Explore a sprawling route of 11 stations in total freedom.
In the “Free Drive Mode,” there’s no scoring and no automatic stops—stop or pass stations, open and close doors, and play in-train announcements exactly as you wish.
For an adrenaline rush, switch to the “Overdrive Mode” and experience speeds exceeding 1000km/h!
Open or close doors wherever you like, use a free camera to view your train from any angle, and even run side by side with AI-controlled trains.
Sound the horn, play station arrival announcements, and enjoy carefully crafted departure melodies to immerse yourself in a truly authentic atmosphere.
Feel free to blow the whistle when closing the doors or add any detail you like.
Plus, it supports the “ZUIKI” train controller for an even more realistic operation.
Get ready for a brand-new train driving experience!

This work is in no way affiliated with any real-world railway company.
